item.title: Insert Key (or equivalent) on Ubuntu using a Mac keyboard
item.description: Pretty niche audience for this one, but posting it for my own benefit as much as anything. Thanks to the original link at Ubuntu Forums for the following hints: [fn] + [return] = Insert [fn] + [UPARROW] = Pg Up [fn] + [DOWNARROW]= Pg Down
